005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.AbstractConfigurationFeature;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * Provides a mechanism to configure Metapath evaluation settings.
014 *
015 * @param <V>
016 *          the feature value Java type
017 */
018public final class MetapathEvaluationFeature<V>
019    extends AbstractConfigurationFeature<V> {
020  /**
021   * If enabled, evaluate <a href=
022   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-31/#id-filter-expression">predicates</a>,
023   * otherwise skip evaluating them.
024   */
025  @NonNull
026  public static final MetapathEvaluationFeature<Boolean> METAPATH_EVALUATE_PREDICATES
027      = new MetapathEvaluationFeature<>("evaluate-predicates", Boolean.class, true);
028
029  private MetapathEvaluationFeature(
030      @NonNull String name,
031      @NonNull Class<V> valueClass,
032      @NonNull V defaultValue) {
033    super(name, valueClass, defaultValue);
034  }
035}
